headline.main: UNION OF NATIONS AFTER WAR URGED; World Structure of Mutual Responsibility Called Vital to Keep Peace WARNING ON HATE SOUNDED We Must Not Be Confused by Anger Toward Foe, Hebrew Congregations Hear

lead_paragraph: Only through the creation of an international structure of mutual responsibility will the world obtain a lasting post-war peace period, speakers declared yesterday at the Thirty-eighth Council of the Union of American Hebrew Congregations, which opened its three-day meeting in the Hotel New Yorker.
abstract: Elected Union of Amer Hebrew Congregations Council pres; por
